entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
